mapper.insert:
insert into api_im_gameinfo
betid,
providername,
gameid,
wagercreationdatetime,
currency,
playerid,
stakeamount,
memberexposure,
payoutamount,
winloss,
oddstype,
wagertype,
platform,
issettled,
isconfirmed,
iscancelled,
bettradestatus,
bettradecommission,
bettradebuybackamount,
combotype,
lastupdateddate,
detailitems,
bettime,
betmoney,
nettime,
netmoney,
createtime,
platformflag
#{betid},
#{providername},
#{gameid},
#{wagercreationdatetime},
#{currency},
#{playerid},
#{stakeamount},
#{memberexposure},
#{payoutamount},
#{winloss},
#{oddstype},
#{wagertype},
#{platform},
#{issettled},
#{isconfirmed},
#{iscancelled},
#{bettradestatus},
#{bettradecommission},
#{bettradebuybackamount},
#{combotype},
#{lastupdateddate},
#{detailitems},
#{bettime},
#{betmoney},
#{nettime},
#{netmoney},
#{createtime},
#{platformflag}
mapper.update:
update api_im_gameinfo
providername=#{providername},
gameid=#{gameid},
wagercreationdatetime=#{wagercreationdatetime},
currency=#{currency},
playerid=#{playerid},
stakeamount=#{stakeamount},
memberexposure=#{memberexposure},
payoutamount=#{payoutamount},
winloss=#{winloss},
oddstype=#{oddstype},
wagertype=#{wagertype},
platform=#{platform},
issettled=#{issettled},
isconfirmed=#{isconfirmed},
iscancelled=#{iscancelled},
bettradestatus=#{bettradestatus},
bettradecommission=#{bettradecommission},
bettradebuybackamount=#{bettradebuybackamount},
combotype=#{combotype},
lastupdateddate=#{lastupdateddate},
detailitems=#{detailitems},
bettime=#{bettime},
betmoney=#{betmoney},
nettime=#{nettime},
netmoney=#{netmoney},
createtime=#{createtime},
platformflag=#{platformflag}
where betid=#{betid}
mapper.select: select * from api_im_gameinfo a where a.betid=#{key}
